My boyfriend was trying way too hard, saying shit like "I'm gonna make sure you're safe from everyone, okay?" This was ten seconds before the dog ran in.

And I'm not joking when I say that about a minute after I struggled back into my clothes (he still needed his pants), three teenagers smoking the most powerful weed I have ever had the displeasure of smelling walked up right next to our "hiding spot". Make me safe, my ass.
